comments.body: In the PR description you said this also didn't work for left. Can you add a test for that direction as well? (And if we don't already have it, it may be worth it to add tests for the other two working directions as well).
added left case, the normal direction is covered as part of previous test so we should be fine

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +130,134 @@    RenderSliver s;
    final RenderViewport root = RenderViewport(
      axisDirection: AxisDirection.up,
      crossAxisDirection: AxisDirection.right,
      offset: ViewportOffset.zero(),
